functions.name: show
functions.description: Shows the page action. The page action is shown whenever the tab is selected.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.

functions.name: setTitle
functions.description: Sets the title of the page action. This is displayed in a tooltip over the page action.

tabId.description: The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.

functions.name: setIcon
functions.description: Sets the icon for the page action. The icon can be specified either as the path to an image file or as the pixel data from a canvas element. Either the path or the imageData property must be specified.

tabId.description: The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.

imageData.description: Pixel data for an image. Must be an ImageData object (for example, from a canvas element).

path.description: Relative path to an image in the extension to show in the browser action.

iconIndex.description: Deprecated. The zero-based index into the icons vector specified in the manifest.

functions.name: setPopup
functions.description: Sets the html document to be opened as a popup when the user clicks on the page action's icon.

tabId.description: The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.

popup.description: The html file to show in a popup.  If set to the empty string (''), no popup is shown.

events.name: onClicked
events.description: Fired when a page action icon is clicked.  This event will not fire if the page action has a popup.
